metadata.name: Thirst for Tempest
metadata.description:
I wake up every morning listening
To my blue bird
Singing nonstop...relentlessly;
Oh-so-divine, it hurts my soul!
But her song doesn't thrill me anymore;
I got used to the flame,
The poison,
The love!
We have had enough of heaven between us...
Time for some tempests right here-
Right now!

A very special collaboration piece with abstract artist Ishika Guha (Twitter @IshikaGuha2 )
